verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Malachi|strong="H4401"\w*.\f + \fr 1.1 \ft by…: Heb. by the hand of\f*

I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. Yet ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherein hast thou \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* us? \add Was\add* not \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w Jacob’s|strong="H3290"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: yet I \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*,

And I \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* his \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* and his \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* \w waste|strong="H8077"\w* for the \w dragons|strong="H8568"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

Whereas \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, We are \w impoverished|strong="H7567"\w*, but we will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the desolate \w places|strong="H2723"\w*; thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, They shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w*, but I will throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w*; and they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* them, The \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*, and, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* against whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w indignation|strong="H2194"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will be \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* from the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft from: or, upon: Heb. from upon\f*

¶ A \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w honoureth|strong="H3513"\w* \add his\add* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: if then I \add be\add* a \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, where \add is\add* mine \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*? and if I \add be\add* a \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, where \add is\add* my \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* unto you, O \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, that \w despise|strong="H0959"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. And ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherein have we \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?

Ye \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* upon mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; and ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Wherein have we \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w* thee? In that ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w table|strong="H7979"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w contemptible|strong="H0959"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft offer…: or, bring unto, etc\f*

And if ye \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* for \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w*, \add is it\add* not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*? and if ye \w offer|strong="H5066"\w* the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* and \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*, \add is it\add* not \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*? \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* it now unto thy \w governor|strong="H6346"\w*; will he be \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w* with thee, or \w accept|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w person|strong="H6440"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft for: Heb. to\f*

And now, I pray you, \w beseech|strong="H2470"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that he will be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto us: this hath been by your \w means|strong="H3027"\w*: will he \w regard|strong="H5375"\w* your \w persons|strong="H6440"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 1.9 \ft God: Heb. the face of God\f*\f + \fr 1.9 \ft by…: Heb. from your hand\f*

Who \add is there\add* even among you that would \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \add for nought?\add* neither do ye \w kindle|strong="H0215"\w* \add fire\add* on mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* for \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*. I have no \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* in you, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, neither will I \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* at your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

For from the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* even unto the going \w down|strong="H3996"\w* of the same my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add shall be\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*; and in every \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \add shall be\add* \w offered|strong="H5066"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and a \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add shall be\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ But ye have \w profaned|strong="H2490"\w* it, in that ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w table|strong="H7979"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w polluted|strong="H1351"\w*; and the \w fruit|strong="H5108"\w* thereof, \add even\add* his \w meat|strong="H0400"\w*, \add is\add* \w contemptible|strong="H0959"\w*.

Ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w* also, Behold, what a \w weariness|strong="H4972"\w* \add is it!\add* and ye have \w snuffed|strong="H5301"\w* at it, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; and ye \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add that which was\add* \w torn|strong="H1497"\w*, and the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, and the \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*; thus ye \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* an \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: should I \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* this of your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 1.13  t and ye have…: or, whereas ye might have blown it away *

But \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w deceiver|strong="H5230"\w*, \w which|strong="H3426"\w* hath in his \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* a \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, and \w voweth|strong="H5087"\w*, and \w sacrificeth|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* a corrupt \w thing|strong="H7843"\w*: for I \add am\add* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* \w dreadful|strong="H3372"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.\f + \fr 1.14 \ft which…: Heb. in whose flock is\f*
